title: My Target is the Male Lead’s Son - Novel Updates
tags: Awkward Protagonist   Beautiful Female Lead   Character Growth   Clever Protagonist   Fated Lovers   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Hiding True Identity   Marriage   Modern Day   System Administrator   Transmigration   Wealthy Characters   World Hopping
author: 我要成仙
description:
System 006 has had many hosts. Each one had, under her meticulous 'guidance', perfectly completed their assignments.

Finally, one day she was sued by all of her previous hosts, and now she had to complete those assignments everyone was reluctant to complete!

006: '...Why is my mission to seduce the son of the male lead?!'

System: 'Please, do not complain, or you'll have to endure a 10,000-volt electricity zap.'
 
'...'

006: 'Believe it or not, I’ll sue you!'

The System, smirking, 'Sure I do, which is why you're the host now.”
>
